headline: Why MGM Resorts (MGM) Stock Is Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of hospitality and casino entertainment company MGM Resorts (NYSE:MGM) fell 2.5% in the afternoon session after the major indices continued to retreat (Nasdaq -1.5%, S&P 500 -1.2%) amid profit-taking and renewed concerns about tariffs.
